Footer.address: Address: No. 485, Section 1, Huanzhong Road, Beitun District, Taichung City

HomePage.description: From Design to Operation, We Provide Comprehensive Engineering Solutions for the High-Tech Industry.
HomePage.descriptionDetail1: Let us be rid of complexity and embrace the future. As an integrated professional team, we provide end-to-end installation services—from planning to execution—saving you time, effort, and worry. Yaho System Technology is built on responsibility, integrity, efficiency, professionalism, and customer satisfaction. Together with our partners, rooted in Taiwan, we create value and expand worldwide.
slidesSlogan: A Decade of Experience, Technology Leadership
United in Effort, Expanding Our Services

slide1.details: Integrity is the fundamental core value. We are committed to uphold the principles of honesty and trustworthiness, striving to prove our value through tangible results.

slide2.details: We value the well-being of our customers, employees, suppliers, shareholders, and society, and are committed to fulfilling our social responsibilities, creating shared value, and promoting sustainable development.

slide3.details: We pay close attention to detail, demonstrating professionalism and excellence in quality. Our goal is to deliver precise and reliable services that maximize professional value and consistently exceed customer expectations.

slide4.details: We value efficiency—delivering smart, fast, and dependable solutions that save time and create lasting value.

slide5.details: For YAHO, our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We believe that our success is defined by the feedback of our clients, and we are equally committed to enhancing their competitiveness and growth.

ProductsScroll.description1: We provide a wide range of products and services, focusing on customer needs while pursuing innovation and quality. Whether in software development, system integration, or technical support, we deliver professional solutions tailored to our clients.
ProductsScroll.description2: Our engineering portfolio highlights our expertise and successful projects across diverse industries, including semiconductors, optoelectronics, and healthcare. These achievements demonstrate our technical capabilities and our ability to deliver value in mission-critical projects.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.descriptionDetail1: Yaho System Technology is a technology-driven company specializing in high-tech facility construction, system integration, and maintenance. Our expertise covers hook-up design, tool design, equipment installation, maintenance, and consumables. Backed by a core team with over 20 years of industry experience, we are trusted for our efficiency, professionalism, and customer-focused service.
introduction.descriptionDetail2: Since our founding in 2015, we have grown from insulation, heating, and piping projects into automation integration and global partnerships, offering one-stop engineering solutions for the semiconductor, optoelectronics, and healthcare industries. With complete design capabilities, a skilled technical team, and full after-sales service, we deliver end-to-end solutions—from design to installation, from supply to maintenance. Guided by responsibility, integrity, efficiency, professionalism, and customer satisfaction, Yaho continues to grow with our partners, creating value together. Rooted in Taiwan, we are expanding to the world.
introduction.descriptionDetail4: A Decade of Experience, Technology Leadership
introduction.descriptionDetail6: United in Effort, Expanding Our Services

coreValue.title: Core Value
coreValue.Integrity description: Integrity is the fundamental core value. We are committed to uphold the principles of honesty and trustworthiness, striving to prove our value through tangible results.
coreValue.Responsibility description: We recognize sincerely that the well-being of our customers, suppliers, employees, shareholders, and society at large is essential to our success. In response to the trust of our stakeholders, we are committed to actively fulfilling our corporate social responsibilities, creating shared value, and striving for sustainable development.
coreValue.Professionalism description: We pay close attention to detail, demonstrating professionalism and excellence in quality. Our goal is to deliver precise and reliable services that maximize professional value and consistently exceed customer expectations.
coreValue.Efficiency description: We value efficiency—delivering smart, fast, and dependable solutions that save time and create lasting value.
coreValue.Customer Satisfaction description: For YAHO, our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We believe that our success is defined by the feedback of our clients, and we are equally committed to enhancing their competitiveness and growth.

benefits.title: 福利制度
benefits.subtitle1: 入職第一天起，已為你未來的薪酬進行規劃
benefits.subtitle2: 我們有明確的績效評核制度，獎金依個人貢獻發放，讓努力更有方向、回饋更有價值
benefits.subtitle3: 節日的溫度，由我們傳遞
benefits.subtitle5: 延伸福利-額外的配套措施幫你解決
benefits.subtitle6: 請/休假制度與保險一切符合勞動法規

description1.content1: 年資滿3個月、1年、3年、5年設有調薪節點 (依據個人績效表現)
description1.content2: 每年8月會依據個人績效表現調薪
description1.content3: 提供專業需求的教育訓練補助

description2.content1: 年終獎金-- 依據當年度營運與個人績效，基數平均為2個月。
description2.content2: 年中分紅-- 依據上年度營運獲利狀況提撥

description3.content1: 三節禮金 (五一、端午、中秋)

description4.content1: 除了法規保險，入職第一天即享團險保障

description5.content5: 配發公務機+公務機通話費補助
description5.content6: 提供每季部門聚餐費用

project.title: Services
project.description: We provide a wide range of products and services, focusing on customer needs while pursuing innovation and quality. Whether in software development, system integration, or technical support, we deliver professional solutions tailored to our clients.
project.system design description:
High-efficiency, safe, and scalable production infrastructure.
Complete facility systems for power, gas, chemicals, exhaust, and cooling water.
project.system design Comments list:
22. Cable-tray
23. Rack(support)
24. PUMP
25. Exhaust pipe
26. PUMPING-LINE(EV)’s pipe to
project.system design Mainframe list:
27. Local Scrubber
28. Gas & PCW’s panel
29. Pumping-exhaust pipe
30. Main power distribution
project.Gas Chemical description: Gas & Chemical System Solutions: Customized design and installation of gas and chemical systems, including secondary distribution.
project.Gas Chemical application: Optoelectronics, Semiconductors, Traditional Manufacturing, Electronics, Medical, and more.
project.AMHS description: Pipeline solutions for AMHS storage stockers in semiconductor and optoelectronics industries.
project.AMHS scope: According to AMHS requirements, we perform comprehensive pipeline design for storage stockers, completing pipeline pre-fit, assembly, onsite installation, and system commissioning.
project.AMHS application: Applicable to optoelectronics, semiconductor processes, and other high-clean, precision handling environments.
project.AMHS features:
Stocker Services Scope: from design to commissioning, providing a one-stop solution
Professional Design: pipeline layout, stress analysis, CAD drawings, gas demand evaluation
Precise Assembly: cabinet pre-fit, welding assembly, initial leak testing
Rigorous Installation: onsite placement, structural fixing, system integration testing
Complete Commissioning: AMHS connection, utilities activation, client acceptance.
project.AMAT description: We focus on tool installation, covering Tier-0 assembly after tools enter the fab, including chamber assembly, signal wiring, and utility (power, water, gas) connections, for tool types such as CVD-DSM, PVD-MDP, ETCH, and more.
project.AMAT features: We specialize in the installation of semiconductor equipment, covering Tier-0 initial assembly after tools enter the fab, including tool and chamber assembly, signal connection, and installation of power, water, and gas pipelines, providing comprehensive services. Our team possesses both professional expertise and practical experience, ensuring that the installation process is accurate, safe, and efficient. We help clients accelerate production line ramp-up and shorten equipment validation timelines. Our service scope covers a wide range of tool types, including CVD-DSM, PVD-MDP, ETCH, and more. We continuously follow industry standards and customer requirements to deliver optimized installation and validation processes. We are committed to maintaining the highest quality standards at every stage, ensuring that tools achieve stable production in the shortest possible time, thereby helping our clients enhance productivity and competitiveness.
project.SMIFPOD description: Installation, calibration, and maintenance services to ensure optimal operation.
project.Parts description: From engineering and installation to component supply—complete support.
project.Parts features:
✓ Comprehensive Facility Support: From engineering design and equipment installation to parts requirements, Yaho provides full support.
✓ Reverse Engineering Expertise: Yaho possesses extensive experience in reverse engineering, analyzing, reconstructing, and replicating on-site equipment parts, now offering customized quotations.
✓ Professional Customization:
project.Parts features description:
Acrylic Parts – EMO Cover, Rack Cover, Gantry Power Cover, DPN Cover, Anti-Pinch Block, Machine Acrylic Nameplates, etc.
Stainless Steel Parts – Parts Storage Box, ISSG Tripod, Stainless Steel Foot Pedal, Trolley, Stainless Steel IPA Storage Cylinder, Stainless Steel Round Trash Can, Screws, and more.
project.OneStop description: From planning to execution—efficient, reliable, and hassle-free.
project.OneStop1 description: Gas piping, chemical piping, heat tracing.
project.OneStop4 description: Integration of design, secondary system setup, equipment installation, maintenance, and consumables.
project.Asis description1: Expertise in Gas, Chemical, and Signal (5G) Engineering: Delivering superior system performance.
project.Asis description2: Full-Scope Design Solutions: Secondary distribution, 5D design, software design.
